=A0Why I've had enough=
 of these insane idiots in the so called paranormal. God forbid anyone shou=
ld question their little pearls of wisdom flowing from their sacred keyboar=
ds.
=A0
=A0I''ve said it before, and I'll say it again, I do this work for =
my own curiosity, I don't seek fame and fortune like these others do, and I=
 have no ego to puff up to the world. I do not care if anyone uses my boxes=
, I don't even sell the crap. It ain't gonna matter---the comet is on it's =
way! Y'all have three years, I'd use the time wisely.
=A0
=A0I left the nam=
e off this, but anyone can probably figure out who sent it, the same person=
 that attacks many researchers in this field. 
=A0
"Frank,
=A0
You have a b=
ig mouth on that piece of shit group evp-itc come over to the---- group whe=
re I can respond to your fuckin retarded rants. You call me a crack head, y=
ou senile old idiot, don't hate people for being your superior in the field=
 just because your boxes are crap now and nobody uses them for anything oth=
er than dust collecters. If I were you I would go back into the bathroom si=
t on the bowl and think about what an obscure hasbeen asshole you have beco=
me. 
=A0
Come to my group and open your mouth and I'll take the wind right =
out of your fuckin sails.
=A0
All is possible, nothing is probable"







=
